summary: This simple mod simply lowers the \'fist\' when you have nothing in a hand equipped, this is perfect for players who prefer fighting with a single weapon or dislike having the fists up at all times.
descriptionHtml:
This simple mod simply lowers the \'fist\' when you have nothing in a hand equipped, this is perfect for players who prefer fighting with a single weapon or dislike having the fists up at all times.

You can still fist fight and you will see your fists when you throw punches, but the \'idle\' fist is lowered off the screen.
author: Jjiinx
